name: The SnakeMother • Le Serpent-Mère
description:
Immortality, Divine Dreams and Sovereignty

Enter the SnakeMother's Den as Queen Unshibaba - Conquer Immortality.
Or free an ancient being from a divine malediction.
Or leave the Den as something else.

Use left or right to select your choices.

French version downloadable below.

TW : Some routes contain text depictions of :
• Blood.
• Wounds inflicted on humans and intelligent creatures. 
-
Made with an extensive use of Image to Bitsy by ruin
And a responsible use of Add Bitsy Audio by Mark Wonnacot
